title: Wrench Everyday's Freddy "Tavarish" and Andrew Howell
description:
Freddy "Tavarish" Hernandez likes to buy cars that should be junked, and rebuild them. Or turbo them. He rebuilt a twin-turbo Lambo, and most recently, bought a Ferrari 355 Spyder that had CAUGHT ON FIRE, and is going to turn it into a coupe. He's a mad man in the best way, inspiring you to wrench. And now he has a new channel, with his friend, Andrew Howell, call Wrench Every Day/

This show is a video! https://youtu.be/buw3ttgFGpY

Follow Us!
T: @thesmokingtire, @zackklapman
IG: @thesmokingtire, @fakezackklapman @therealtavarish @heavymetalfl

Buy shirts to support TST!
https://www.blipshift.com/tst

Check out their shows!
https://www.youtube.com/user/tavarish

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTYRecH8Uqq9xtaWLrYvE1A
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
